text: aur (he nabee!) jab hamaaree khulee aayaten unhen sunaee jaatee hain, to jo hamase milane kee aasha nahin rakhate, ve kahate hain ki isake siva koee doosara quraan lao ya isamen parivartan kar do. unase kah do ki mere bas mein ye nahin hai ki apanee or se isamen parivartan kar doon. main to bas us prakaashana ka anuyaayee hoon, jo meree or kee jaatee hai. main yadi apane paalanahaar kee avagya karoon, to main ek ghor din kee yaatana se darata hoon
